title: DEMANDS FOR PRODUCTION BACKUPS AND ENVIRONMENTS REFRESHS

task_list.instruction_title:
For all the application involved in the migration BACK-up All applications (**+ QSAM files for ATLAS**) + REQUIRED FILES on **PROD **Backup BEFORE EOD/EOM with NEXT RUN date on Run/DR Date : ** **29.08.2025**
**

Report outstanding issues for 50 SQL bases missing backup automation with the new \"MOT12\" tag required by NETBACKUP → As a workarround, a manual visual check needs to be done at D+1 to check and set these tags.
